timeline.message:
Support rocks DBs in EVMTool

Allows the DB of a stopped node to be used for benchmarking.

Signed-off-by: Danno Ferrin <danno.ferrin@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Does this need to be a supplier? I think the db is only created when you call create
timeline.author: RatanRSur

replies.bodyText: It's a supplier so we don't initialize it unless we actually need it.  @Lazy would be the lombok annotation.
replies.author: shemnon
